channel.title: ToL Drinking game
channel.description:
Hello,
I would like to have some extra fun while playing ToL, so I ask you if you have a rules for some kind of ToL drinking game, or we can create one. You know, something like Knight claim = 1 shot Fake Alch revealed = 1 shot Someone says "King is evil" = 1 shot etc.
I am not much experienced with forum, so I hope my post is not against the rules and someone will be interested.
Your Lone Ranger

item.title: ToL Drinking game
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
okay i’m going to play this tonight starting now. except i’m not taking shots, just a drink beer. I’ll let you know how many bottles i go through in 3 hours. so my rules are

Take a drink if:

somebody claims knight
someone says "king is evil
someone says “role” instead of “class”
my class changes during a game
prince dies n1
scorned/fool wins
lynched day 2 randomly
get exed as alchemist
i get a phys/butler role

and i’ll add 5 more:
every time i win a game
every time i get a kill as NK
every time king sends guard to kill and kills a BD
every time i get occupied
every time get linked by psychic or jailed

alright lets go! see ya in 3 hours. also if you end up in a game with me (CN73DRUMMER) say hi!

Read full topic

item.title: ToL Drinking game
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
Everyone time someone says role instead of class - 1 shot

(If you really want a good big drink)
Every time your class changes during a game - 1 shot
